attributes.action: Content for A-Levels and GCSE's must be Reduced
attributes.additional_details: Due to the COVID-19 lockdown, many students have missed out on a huge chunk of learning, leaving huge gaps in their knowledge. We're asking the Government and/or Parliament to remove content from the GCSE and A-Level specification in all subjects, to give students a chance to progress further into their adult life/career. Without a content reduction, Grades could be considerably lower, once again linking to the fact that many students have had no teacher to pupil intervention.
attributes.background: We're asking the Government to Consider further measures to reduce the amount of content in GCSE and A-Level examinations taking place in July 2021.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
